full_summary: ==================================== # Stage 2: Natural Bridge and Dog Lake Bridge Rehabilitation ### Institution Parks Canada ### Government of Canada Contracting Entity * Address: 145 McDermot Avenue, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada R3B 0R9 * Phone: (204) 390-7234 * Fax: (855) 983-1808 * Email: [alison.guilford@pc.gc.ca](mailto:alison.guilford@pc.gc.ca) ### Tender Opportunities **Request for Proposal (RFP)** - Stage 2: Bridge Rehabilitation Parks Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit financial bids for the rehabilitation of two Class A Pedestrian Trail bridges: Natural Bridge, Yoho National Park, and Dog Lake Bridge, Kootenay National Park. **Project Scope** The rehabilitation work includes: * Concrete crack repair * Concrete patch repair * Concrete pin installation and repair * Approach re-grading ### Tender Details * **Tender Number:** cb-653-81484797 * **Amendment Number:** 1 * **Solicitation Number:** 5P468-24-0031/A * **Publication Date:** July 3, 2024 * **Tender Closing Date:** July 18, 2024 (16:00:00 MDT) * **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 29, 2024 * **Expected Contract End Date:** September 30, 2024 ### Pre-Qualification Requirements Prior to this Stage 2 Request for Proposal, a pre-qualification process evaluated potential suppliers. ### Tender Evaluation Criteria Tenders will be evaluated based on the **Lowest Price**. ### Trade Agreements This procurement is subject to the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**. ### Contact Information For any questions or concerns, please contact Alison Guilford at (204) 390-7234 or [alison.guilford@pc.gc.ca](mailto:alison.guilford@pc.gc.ca). ### ## Features and Work ( Omega 8) Project Overview --------------- * Design, constructing, and fabrication of a tunnel in ## national Park - Page number addition requested ] by local engineer’s Dental surgery impersonation care]: A construction rejuvenation arrange args anon .
